product_name: The North Face Sandoval Full-Zip Hoodie - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Traverse the urban landscape or relax by the fire pit after a long day on the trail with the comfortable fleece Sandoval Full-Zip hoodie from The North Face. Soft blend of cotton and polyester jersey is lined with polyester tricot fleece for great warmth. Hood includes a stowable polyester balaclava that's easily accessible when you need extra warmth for your face on a cold day. Open hand pockets; zippered chest pockets; left chest pocket has a port for routing your music player's headphones to your ears. Closeout.
short_description: Traverse the urban landscape or relax by the fire pit after a long day on the trail with the comfortable fleece Sandoval Full-Zip hoodie from The North Face.
